argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uvcvvcl2.u | |- U = ( R unitVec I ) |
| 2 |  | uvcvvcl2.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | uvcvvcl2.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | uvcvvcl2.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | uvcvvcl2.j | |- ( ph -> J e. I ) |
| 6 |  | uvcvvcl2.k | |- ( ph -> K e. I ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 9 | 1, 7, 8 | #P_uvcvval | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W /\ J e. I ) /\ K e. I ) -> ( ( U ` J ) ` K ) = if ( K = J , ( 1r ` R ) , ( 0g ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 4, 5, 6, 9 | #P_syl31anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( U ` J ) ` K ) = if ( K = J , ( 1r ` R ) , ( 0g ` R ) ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 7 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 2, 8 | #P_ring0cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 0g ` R ) e. B ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_ifcld | |- ( R e. Ring -> if ( K = J , ( 1r ` R ) , ( 0g ` R ) ) e. B ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> if ( K = J , ( 1r ` R ) , ( 0g ` R ) ) e. B ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( U ` J ) ` K ) e. B ) |
